I think I can have Jesse v.02 ready for release by the end of the year.

It=
 will be a fully (features I think it needs) functional **map**
editor for =
gladiator that runs under Windows.  I promise that it will
have features fo=
r map editing than the current scenario editor does:

features:

1)ability =
to resize maps
2)print out maps
3)ability to replace tiles using linear equ=
ations

It'll also have a complimentary program that can edit/display map t=
ile
data used by the program. 

* * *

When I get pass my small current han=
dle (passing data from one form to
another and having one form call a subro=
utine in another form), it'll
simply be a matter of me having free time to =
code the rest of it. 
I've laid out the menu system.

* * *

Don't ask abou=
t making it a scenario editor yet.  I want to get the
functionality of the =
map editor working before I add the layer of
handling the entire scenario.
=
